attributes.action: Stop Rishi Sunaks new proposed scheme for pay per mile for all drivers
attributes.additional_details: Think of another solution as this is not practical and would make it almost impossible for some people to afford to work
attributes.background: Scrap the ridiculous idea and stop punishing the working classes.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560867
